description: This type represents the faulty component that has a negative impact on an NS.  It shall comply with the provisions defined in Table 8.5.3.4-1.

faultyNestedNsInstanceId.description: Identifier of the faulty nested NS instance.

faultyResourceType.description: Identifier of the faulty NS virtual link instance.

faultyNsVirtualLinkInstanceId.description: Identifier of the faulty VNF instance.
